short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: E-commerce Payment Gateway and cheaper faster DEX on TON. DEX on The Open Network (TON) with the best farms in DeFi for TGR.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension is a comprehensive solution for any business, ensuring convenience and efficiency in payment management. 

Users can easily issue invoices and track order statuses without leaving their browser. Features include the ability to directly integrate with banks and full support of payment technologies. 

The extension also supports recurring payments for subscription services and offers flexible solutions for various industries, including retail, taxi services, the gaming industry, and more. 

It's the perfect tool for optimizing payment processes and enhancing the efficiency of your business operations.
